long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Facebook Auto-approve Public Group Finder extracts data from facebook group webpage and exports it as Excel or CSV files

Facebook Auto-approve Public Group Finder

A powerful tool to download Facebook auto approve public group lists into Excel or CSV format.

Effortless Facebook Research and Analysis
Easily export Facebook Auto-approve Public Group lists with just one click. Ideal for lead generation and social media research.

Key Features:

Export Facebook Auto-approve Public Groups to CSV and Excel.
Perfect for Facebook research or analysis.

How to Export Facebook Auto-approve Public Groups Lists:

Log in to Facebook.com.
Open Facebook Group Search Page in Browser.
Enter a related keyword to find relavant groups.
Click the extension icon from toolbar.
There you will get bunch of options to download in CSV / XLS / Plain Text:

Group Id
Group Name
Group Link
Group Profile Pic
Posts per duration
Group Members Count
Auto approve Status
Group Description
Group Type

Data Privacy:
All data is processed locally on your computer and never passes through our web servers. Your exported data remains completely private.
